description: This Dart source file defines a Flutter widget for the 'Delivery History' screen in a food delivery app. It contains UI components such as an AppBar, header, and placeholder list items for delivered orders, earnings, and filters.

classes.name: DeliveryHistoryScreen
classes.description: A stateless widget representing the delivery history screen with a scaffold, app bar, and list of placeholders.

classes.name: _Header
classes.description: A stateless widget used as a header in the delivery history screen, styled with a custom gradient and layout.

classes.name: _Row
classes.description: A reusable stateless widget representing a row with an icon and text, styled as a card.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree for DeliveryHistoryScreen, including app bar and body with list view.

methods.name: _Header.build
methods.description: Builds the header section with styled container, icon, and title.

methods.name: _Row.build
methods.description: Builds a row with an icon and descriptive text inside a styled container.
